description: Non-material amendment to planning permission 19/AP/6275 dated 10/01/2020 for 'Demolition of the existing dwelling house and construction of a replacement two-storey dwelling plus roof storey and basement' for the following changes: 1)	Amendment to basement footprint and addition of a spiral staircase2)	Lowering of ground floor windows and doors on the front elevation to accommodate a lintel above 3)	Replacement of screen on the front elevation with three windows and an additional window4)	Additional gap of one window-width on the front elevation between the row of three taller windows to the landing and the row of five shorter windows (obscure glazing) to the bathroom5)	Fall protection on the windows on the left hand side at first and second floor level on the front elevation6)	Amendment to the window arrangement at ground floor level on the south elevation 7)	Removal of a side door on the north elevation 8)	Amendment of the low pitch roof on the rear elevation upwards 9)	Reduction in height of the of the first floor windows on the rear elevation to accommodate a lintel above and the positioning of the low pitch roof 10)	 Amendment to the patio door arrangement on the rear elevation 11)	 Change in materials above ground floor level from vertical tiles to London stock-style brick slips12)	 Change in materials from timber framed windows to triple glazed windows in white steel reinforced plastic frames
